# Commit Messages Generation Flow

## Feature Branch

```bash
feat(module): message
```

## Fix Branch

```bash
fix(module): message
```

## Documentation Branch

```bash
doc(module): message
```

## Style Branch

```bash
style(module): message
```

## Refactor Branch

```bash
refactor(module): message
```

## Update Package

```bash
bump(module): message
```

## Update Dependencies

```bash
update(module): message
```

## Update Chosen Files

```bash
chose(module): message
```

```note
    - Generate message commit use english
    - Don't generate long description
    - Max length of message is 50 characters
    - Not use emoji
    - If module is unknown, use `core` or empty remove ()
        - vd: `feat: message`, `fix: message`,...
```
